articles.author: Matias Grez
articles.title: Tyrese Haliburton’s historic performance leads Indiana Pacers past New York Knicks to the brink of NBA Finals - CNN
articles.description: The Indiana Pacers are now just one game away from the NBA Finals after an inspired Tyrese Haliburton led the team to a 130-121 win over the New York Knicks in Game 4 of the Eastern Conference Finals.
articles.content: The Indiana Pacers are now just one game away from the NBA Finals after an inspired Tyrese Haliburton led the team to a 130-121 win over the New York Knicks in Game 4 of the Eastern Conference Finals… [+2437 chars]
